In England, in the seven days to 03 June, there were 24,893 new confirmed cases (44.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 May, there were 16,449 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 51% (8,444 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 June is 3,950,123 (7,017.8 cases per 100,000 population).
